name: Drumy
description:
Drumy is a music game, designed to provide a fun way to exercise your rhythm sense.

You are challenged to complete 100+ unique levels/rhythms on a Djembe drum with sets of 8 or 16 beats. After some levels, the tempo will be stepped up live during the game. A coloring scheme is used for the different playing areas, making the logic easily understood by children as well.

The individual rhythms are split in three different difficulty and thematic groups:
- Rhythm (Level Sections: 1-4 ; Total of 36 Levels):
You are introduced to the world of Drumy. Every rhythm has 8 beats and there are two playing areas one for the left and one for the right hand, colored in red and yellow respectively.
- Coordination (Level Sections 5-8 ; Total of 36 Levels):
In this group, we introduce a third drum playing area. The coordination between your hands and eyes becomes key. The rhythm sets become ever more richer and colorful.
- Mastery (Level Sections 9-12 ; Total of 36 Levels)
Each level is now consisting of 16 beats and it gets real fun to play.

Music and music playing has been many times reported to have positive and lasting effects on the human brain and emotions. Drumy is a great way to get you started or to foster your skills.

You can customize Drumy by changing the drum's size, showing or hiding a metronome, or choosing to continue or stop playing upon level completion.

Drumy runs on your iPhone and iPad and is integrated with Game Center.

Demo Video and More Info: http://creatub.com/drumy.html
